answerText: Tropic of Cancer[10] This American author wrote Tropic of Cancer, Tropic of Capricorn, and The Rosy Crucifixion trilogy.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Yale A, OSU A | 13 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this novel which was the subject of several obscenity trials thirty years after it was published. It fictionalizes its author's struggles as a writer in Paris in the late 1920s and early 1930s.
